headings: Use Lumeno in your every day learning
paragraphs: Make learning accessible, engaging, and personalized for everyone
Trusted by students at top universities globally
Click any feature to view its demo
Use Study with Lumi to prepare for class by uncovering key discussion points, complete with page references for academic integrity.
Use Lumi Notes so you can focus on engaging in class with auto-generated smart, structured notes — just layer in your teacher's commentary.

summary.main_content_text:
“I used to get lost in my readings and waste time trying to make notes that made sense. Lumeno AI helped me actually understand what I was reading. Chatting with my PDFs and getting instant summaries made studying way less stressful.”
Jay Han
Marketing Major
University of British Columbia
Trusted by students at top universities globally
The all-in-one learning tool
Click any feature to view its demo
Use Lumeno in your every day learning
Before class:
Use Study with Lumi to prepare for class by uncovering key discussion points, complete with page references for academic integrity.
During class:
Use Lumi Notes so you can focus on engaging in class with auto-generated smart, structured notes — just layer in your teacher's commentary.
After class:
Use Practice Portal to test your understanding with multiple-choice or written questions, tailored to each document.
